metadata.description: Life in the year 2054 has been reduced to a data feed. The fusing of virtual reality and cybernetics allow citizens to employ android substitutes that let them interact with the world without ever leaving their homes. It's a perfect world, and it's up to Detectives Harvey Greer and Pete Ford of the Metro Police Department to keep it that way. But to do so they'll need to stop a techno-terrorist bent on returning society to a time when people lived their lives instead of merely experiencing them. Go deeper into the world of The Surrogates with these trade paperbacks collecting the original mini-series and it's sequel, Flesh and Bone!
metadata.name: The Surrogates
